functions.description:
Pulls time series data from Seeq sensors over a specified time range.
This is an array function that should be called on a range that can accommodate the output.
functions.name: PULL_SENSOR_DATA

parameters.description: Start time for data pull (ISO format: "2024-01-01T00:00:00")
parameters.name: startDatetime

parameters.description: End time for data pull (ISO format: "2024-01-31T23:59:59")
parameters.name: endDatetime

parameters.description: Grid interval for data (e.g., "15min", "1h", "1d") - defaults to "15min"
parameters.name: grid

functions.description: Searches for sensors in Seeq without pulling data.
functions.name: SEARCH_SENSORS
